text: They Gave Him a Gun is a 1937 American crime drama movie directed by W.S. Van Dyke and was based on the 1936 novel of the same name by William J. Cowen. It stars Spencer Tracy, Gladys George, Franchot Tone, Edgar Dearing, Cliff Edwards and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by W. S. Van Dyke
title: They Gave Him a Gun
